Update 10/29 - 13 remain

Update 10/22 - sold quite a few on eBay. Open to offers on all that remain.

Update 10/16 - Added 5 tough pops added. Everything moved to eBay Auctions with minimum bids. I'll pull anything except the 5 new additions, as long as they don't have bids. [URL="https://www.ebay.com/sch/burlssports/m.html?_trksid=p3692"]Link to auctions[/URL]

Added the following:
1910 t210-8 Old Mill Gygli Birmingham SGC 10 PR total pop 4 $80 SOLD
1910 t210-8 Old Mill Allen Mobile SGC 50/4 VG-EX total pop 4 (1 higher) $250 SOLD
1910 t210-8 Old Mill Rhoton Mobile SGC 30/2 GD total pop 4 SOLD
1910 t210-8 Old Mill Wilder Mobile SGC 10/1 PR total pop 5 $100 [URL="https://www.ebay.com/itm/153227590314"]scans in listing[/URL]
1910 t210-8 Old Mill Robertson New Orleans SGC 40/3 VG total pop 5 SOLD

Update 10/12 - 16 sold so far. 31 left. Going camping tonight, so I'll likely be unresponsive to messages for about 24 hours starting 4 PM CST.

Update 10/11 - Negotiations for the whole lot fell through. Currently negotiating on several cards for people who sent messages about specific cards in case the deal fell through. I'll give those priority for the next 24 hours on the cards marked "in negotiations" since they waited patiently. :) 

Hey folks! 

The following group of T210-8s are for sale. Most of these came from an original collection found in west Tennessee. The collection consisted of a large number of t210s (many of which I've offered for sale on here before) and T211s (not for sale). 

Most of the nicer conditioned cards were added later, the ones from the original collection were affixed to a scrapbook. Many were soaked. The more successful soaking efforts are evident, while some cards had been glued more than once and didn't soak as well. All cards are graded. Shipping is $3 flat.

Prices and links to images listed. These will move to eBay on Sunday.
